hadiths.text: It was narrated that Hisham bin Zaid said; "Ans and I entered upon Al-Hakam - that it, Ibn Ayyb - and there were some people shooting at a chicken in the house of the governor. He said:'The Messenger of Allah forbade using animals as targets;

chapter.eng-name: Prohibition Of (Eating) An Animal, Which Ws Used As A Target
